description:
If you suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to another party's negligent, careless or reckless actions, you need an experienced attorney on your side to help you recover the compensation and benefits you deserve. At Jonathan R. Brockman, P.C., in Alpharetta, Georgia, our attorneys have over 60 years of combined legal experience, and our law firm serves clients throughout Fulton County who have personal injury, wrongful death and workers' compensation claims resulting from any of the following:

•Motor vehicle accidents
•Semi-truck accidents
•DUI accidents
•Hit-and-run accidents
•Pedestrian accidents
•Bicycle accidents
•Construction accidents
•Work-related injuries and illnesses
•Defective products
•Premises liability accidents
•Dog bites
•Food poisoning

Experienced attorney Jonathan R. Brockman established our law firm in 2001, and since that time, we have grown to become one of the largest and most-respected personal injury practices in the state. Armed with the invaluable insight gained from representing insurance companies and other defendants in liability cases, our attorneys can devise effective strategies aimed at obtaining the maximum amount of compensation possible.

Working alongside dedicated and experienced attorneys, Cynthia Matthews Daley and Allen McDuffie, Mr. Brockman and our law firm can help you recover the damages you incurred so that you can focus on your recovery. Having secured millions of dollars on behalf of our clients, we can handle any case no matter how large or complex, and we will remain by your side throughout the process to ensure we help you achieve the justice you seek.

To receive a free initial consultation about your specific case, you can contact Jonathan R. Brockman, P.C., to schedule an appointment.
